name: Blessings of the Slow God
description: While in the fruit-induced coma, you experience vegetal bliss, slowly, and are transformed.

results.text: You feel certain you were not meant to be a plant, gaining [[1d3]] Personality permanently.
Some of the Slow God's Will returns with you. You may cast @Compendium[dcc-core-book.dcc-core-spell-journals.Word of Command] twice a day using [[/r 1d16]].
You are slower to respond to the discomforts and ills of meat-life, gaining [[1d3]] Stamina, permanently.
Regeneration is natural, and you awaken with the power to heal others. Three times a day, you may Lay on Hands as a Cleric, using [[/r 1d14]].
You are just really glad you woke up. Really really glad. [[1d3]] Luck glad.
